name: Barbershop Simulator VR
summary: Become the best Barber in town! With advanced hair interactions, wash, cut and style hair to give your customers the look they deserve. Get a detailed score for what you do from a powerful evaluation system. Decorate your shop to match your own style. Upgrade your shop by purchasing appliances or tools that will make your customers happier. Keep your shop and tools clean to maintain a good hygiene score.
